# uptimekuma_maintenance_monitors (Data Source)

Get monitors associated with a maintenance window



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `maintenance_id` (Number) Maintenance window ID

### Read-Only

- `monitor_ids` (List of Number) List of monitor IDs associated with the maintenance window
